snippet: The man, Juan Martin Garcia, 35, was put to death for the 1998 killing and robbery of Hugo Solano in Houston.
abstract: State of Texas executes Juan Martin Garcia, who in 1998 fatally shot and robbed Christian missionary Hugo Solano of $8 in Houston, TX.
lead_paragraph: The man, Juan Martin Garcia, 35, was put to death for the 1998 killing and robbery of Hugo Solano in Houston.

headline.main: Texas: Man Is Executed for Killing Missionary for $8
headline.print_headline: Texas: Man Is Executed for Killing Missionary for $8
